languages.text: {n}Люди внимают вашим словам, широко распахнув глаза, ловя каждый звук с жадностью обездоленных. Когда вы заканчиваете говорить, вам отвечает многоголосый рев — и звон оружия.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Люди внимают вашим словам, широко распахнув глаза, ловя каждый звук с жадностью обездоленных. Когда вы заканчиваете говорить, вам отвечает многоголосый рев — и звон оружия.{/n}
traits.speaker: RoaringMale_Gladiator

languages.text: {n}The people listen to you with wide eyes, hanging on every word with the greed of the downtrodden. As soon as you are finished speaking, you hear a cacophony of roars — and the clanging of weapons.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Люди внимают вашим словам, широко распахнув глаза, ловя каждый звук с жадностью обездоленных. Когда вы заканчиваете говорить, вам отвечает многоголосый рев — и звон оружия.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The people listen to your words with wide eyes, greedily hanging on every sound as if they were their only means of existence. As soon as you are finished speaking, you hear a cacophony of roars — and the clanging of weapons.{/n}
traits.speaker: RoaringMale_Gladiator

traits.locale_text: {n}The people listen to your words with wide eyes, greedily hanging on every sound as if they were their only means of existence. As soon as you are finished speaking, you hear a cacophony of roars — and the clanging of weapons.{/n}
traits.speaker: RoaringMale_Gladiator

traits.speaker: RoaringMale_Gladiator

traits.speaker: RoaringMale_Gladiator

traits.locale_text: {n}The people listen to you with wide eyes, hanging on every word with the greed of the downtrodden. As soon as you are finished speaking, you hear a cacophony of roars — and the clanging of weapons.{/n}
traits.speaker: RoaringMale_Gladiator

traits.locale_text: {n}The people listen to you with wide eyes, hanging on every word with the greed of the downtrodden. As soon as you are finished speaking, you hear a cacophony of roars — and the clanging of weapons.{/n}
traits.speaker: RoaringMale_Gladiator

languages.text: {n}虐げられた人々は目を見開いてあなたの言葉に耳を傾け、一言一句にしがみつく。あなたが話し終わるとすぐに、唸り声と武器の鳴り響く音が聞こえてくる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The people listen to you with wide eyes, hanging on every word with the greed of the downtrodden. As soon as you are finished speaking, you hear a cacophony of roars — and the clanging of weapons.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}虐げられた人々は目を見開いてあなたの言葉に耳を傾け、一言一句にしがみつく。あなたが話し終わるとすぐに、唸り声と武器の鳴り響く音が聞こえてくる。{/n}
traits.speaker: RoaringMale_Gladiator

languages.text: {n}所有人都瞪大了眼睛听你说话，贪婪地聆听着你说出的每一个字。你的话音刚落，人群中就传来了一阵吼声与武器的铿锵声。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The people listen to you with wide eyes, hanging on every word with the greed of the downtrodden. As soon as you are finished speaking, you hear a cacophony of roars — and the clanging of weapons.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}所有人都瞪大了眼睛听你说话，贪婪地聆听着你说出的每一个字，仿佛这就是他们人生唯一的目的。你的话音刚落，人群中就传来了一阵吼声与武器的铿锵声。{/n}
traits.speaker: RoaringMale_Gladiator

languages.text: {n}La gente te escucha con los ojos abiertos de par en par, aferrándose ansiosamente a cada palabra con la codicia de los oprimidos. En cuanto terminas de hablar, oyes una disonancia de rugidos y el ruido metálico de las armas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The people listen to you with wide eyes, hanging on every word with the greed of the downtrodden. As soon as you are finished speaking, you hear a cacophony of roars — and the clanging of weapons.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La gente escucha tus palabras con los ojos muy abiertos, aferrándose ansiosamente a cada sonido como si fuera su único medio de existencia. En cuanto terminas de hablar, oyes una disonancia de rugidos y el ruido metálico de las armas.{/n}
traits.speaker: RoaringMale_Gladiator

languages.text: {n}Die Leute hören dir mit großen Augen zu und hängen mit der Gier der Geknechteten an deinen Lippen. Kaum hast du ausgesprochen, hörst du eine Kakophonie aus brüllenden Stimmen und klirrenden Waffen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The people listen to you with wide eyes, hanging on every word with the greed of the downtrodden. As soon as you are finished speaking, you hear a cacophony of roars — and the clanging of weapons.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Menge lauscht dir mit weit aufgerissenen Augen, hängt gierig an deinen Lippen, als wären sie das Einzige, was Ihre Existenz gewährleistet. Kaum hast du ausgesprochen, hörst du eine Kakophonie aus brüllenden Stimmen und klirrenden Waffen.{/n}
traits.speaker: RoaringMale_Gladiator

languages.text: {n}Les yeux ronds, comme si elle n'avait d'autre raison d'être, la foule est suspendue à vos moindres paroles. Dès que vous avez fini votre petit laïus, vos tympans résonnent de hurlements fervents et du vacarme des armes qui s'entrechoquent.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The people listen to you with wide eyes, hanging on every word with the greed of the downtrodden. As soon as you are finished speaking, you hear a cacophony of roars — and the clanging of weapons.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les yeux ronds, comme si elle n'avait aucune autre raison d'être, la foule est suspendue à vos moindres paroles. Dès que vous avez fini votre petit laïus, vos tympans résonnent de hurlements fervents et du vacarme des armes qui s'entrechoquent.{/n}
traits.speaker: RoaringMale_Gladiator

languages.text: {n}Gözlerini iyice açmış insanlar, mazlumlara özgü bir doyumsuzlukla söylediklerini dinliyor. Sözünü bitirir bitirmez bağırtılar ve silah tıngırtılarından oluşan bir gürültü duyuluyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The people listen to you with wide eyes, hanging on every word with the greed of the downtrodden. As soon as you are finished speaking, you hear a cacophony of roars — and the clanging of weapons.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Herkes gözlerini iyice açmış, mazlumlara özgü bir doyumsuzlukla söylediklerini dinliyor. Sözünü bitirir bitirmez, bağırtılarla silah tıngırtılarından oluşan bir gürültü duyuluyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: RoaringMale_Gladiator
